info.title: Product Type - Read
info.description: This synchronous inbound OData service enables external systems and other consumers to read product types and their descriptions. This service only supports the GET operation.

x-sap-shortText: Read product type and their descriptions using this synchronous inbound service

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--response-separator--
